bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Authenticated Encryption with Length Expansion for Storage Devices
IEEE Standard for Authenticated Encryption with Length Expansion for Storage Devices

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Cryptographic and data authentication procedures for storage devices that support length expansion, such as tape drives, are specified. Such procedures include the following cryptographic modes of operation for the AES block cipher: CCM, GCM, CBC-HMAC, and XTS-HMAC.

Cryptographic and data authentication procedures for storage devices that support length expansion, such as tape drives, are specified. Such procedures include the following cryptographic modes of operation for the AES block cipher: CCM, GCM, CBC-HMAC, and XTS-HMAC.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
